page.title: 09SCHOOLS
page.content: Queensbury Upper School operates on a 2 week timetable:_ that is to say we only get each particular lesson once a fortnight. This Tuesday is in week one of the timetable. I arrived at school by coach at 8.45 am. I travel by coach from Caddington, which is three miles away, so I get free transport. At 8.50 am we went upstairs for registration room. At 9.00 lessons began. Queensbury is in two blocks, East and West, and we have different lessons in different blocks. Today my first lesson was Latin with Mr. Getter in East, followed by latin with Miss Bridge. At 1.45pm afternoon lessons begin. Today we had maths and English in the west and east. School ends at 3.45am. Afterwards we went home again.
